string-array.name: IntentResActivityListName
string-array.item: EN-字符串，颜色，尺寸的资源文件 测试(ValuesResColorStringDimenActivity)
EN-StateListDrawable资源文件selector 测试(StateListDrawableActivity)
EN-LayerListDrawable资源文件(seekBar) 测试(SeekBarActivity)
EN-LayerListDrawable资源文件(层叠logo) 测试(SeekBarActivity)
EN-ShapeDrawable资源文件 测试(ShapeDrawableActivity)
EN-ClipDrawable资源文件(徐徐展开图片) 测试(ClipDrawableActivity)
EN-AnimationDrawable资源文件(动画变换) 测试(AnimationDrawableActivity)
EN-PropertyAnimation资源文件(属性动画) 测试(PropertyAnimationActivity)
EN-XML资源文件 测试(RawXmlActivity)
EN-样式和主题资源 测试(StyleThemeActivity)
EN-Attribute 资源 测试(AlphaImageViewActivity)

string-array.name: ImageTestActivityListName
string-array.item: EN-图片图像-bitmap 测试(BitmapActivity)
EN-绘图基础-Canves Paint 测试(OnDrawActivity)
EN-绘图基础-Path(绘制效果添加) 测试(DrawPathActivity)
EN-绘图基础-drawTextOnPath(绘制文本) 测试(DrawTextOnPathActivity)
EN-绘图基础-drawLine(手绘画线，双缓冲实现画图板) 测试(DrawBitmapActivity)
EN-绘图基础-弹球小游戏 测试(TableBallActivity)
EN-绘图基础-图片的旋转缩放 测试(MatrixViewActivity)
EN-绘图基础-移动效果 测试(MoveActivity)
EN-绘图基础-扭曲效果 测试(DrawBitmapMeshActivity)
